title: Single of the Week: Leisure – Green Light
content:
The nights are drawing in, the sun barely graces us with it’s presence, and each morning greets us with a undesirable layer of frost, coating every inch of our lives.

This track from Boston based trio Leisure couldn’t be more fitting. Melancholic, utterly vulnerable and willingly understanding. The minimal beat and simplistic piano chords ground much of Green Light, whilst the tender vocals elevate the track to transcendental levels. Stunningly bewitching.

Green Light is released on 7″ via Crash Symbols at the turn of the year. Check out the video below.
